metadata.synopsis: The beastmaster says everything is ready and he'll open up the hatch - you can come out when ready.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Plays automatically after the players arrive back in the Submersible gameplay interior after returning from the iron throne. Follows after the automatic interactive dialog that plays when you get back.

0.speaker: Redhammer the Deviser
0.text: All right, we're good to go. Say goodbye to Cap and come up the hatch when you're ready.
